alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 1:01PM EST until February 19 at 1:15PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EST FOR LACKAWANNA...SOUTHERN WAYNE AND EASTERN LUZERNE COUNTIES... At 100 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Prompton to Hometown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 262 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 143, near 155, and between 164 and 202. Interstate 84 between 1 and 17. Interstate 380 between 13 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Hazleton, Dunmore, Kingston, Plains, Carbondale, Old Forge, Pittston and Archbald. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
